meanings.definition: A loose-fitting garment worn for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: I put on my cozy pyjama before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pyjama set with cute patterns.
meanings.sent3: The pyjama danced off the bed and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were wrapped in a soft pyjama of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The pyjama whispered sweet dreams as she drifted off to sleep.

meanings.definition: A pair of loose-fitting trousers and a jacket worn for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: He wore his favorite pyjama to stay warm at night.
meanings.sent2: The silk pyjama felt luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The pyjama and slippers had a midnight tea party.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as mismatched as her pyjama.
meanings.sent5: The moonlight caught the shimmer of her satin pyjama.
